application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Mature Hornbeam (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 16.00m.  Thin crown density by 25%.  Reduce overhang back from 6 Turner Close by 1.20-1.50m.  Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure up to 1.50m where required.  Remove major dead wood throughout.1 x Mature Hornbeam (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 16.00m.  Thin crown density by 25%.  Reduce overhang back from 6 Turner Close by 1.20-1.50m.  Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure up to 1.50m where required.  Remove major dead wood throughout.1 x Mature Hornbeam (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 16.00m.  Thin crown density by 25%.  Reduce overhang back from 6 Turner Close by 1.20-1.50m.  Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure up to 1.50m where required.  Remove major dead wood throughout.1 x Mature Hornbeam (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 16.00m.  Thin crown density by 25%.  Reduce overhang back from 6 Turner Close by 1.20-1.50m.  Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure up to 1.50m where required.  Remove major dead wood throughout.1 x Mature Hornbeam (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 9.00m.  This tree leans to the North and blocks light to the right of the group.  Thin crown density by 25%.  Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches by up to 1.50m.  Reduce over extended branches back into main crown structure (up to 1.25m) where required.  Remove dead wood throughout crown.
